statements: SELECT id, title, researcher_name, findings, publication_date FROM research_findings_genetic_modification_food_allergies
SELECT researcher_name, title, publication_date, findings, id FROM research_findings_genetic_modification_food_allergies
SELECT findings, publication_date, researcher_name, title, id FROM research_findings_genetic_modification_food_allergies
SELECT publication_date, id, researcher_name, title, findings FROM research_findings_genetic_modification_food_allergies
SELECT title, id, researcher_name, publication_date, findings FROM research_findings_genetic_modification_food_allergies
SELECT title, researcher_name, publication_date FROM research_findings_genetic_modification_food_allergies WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM research_findings_genetic_modification_food_allergies WHERE researcher_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT id, title FROM research_findings_genetic_modification_food_allergies WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT title, findings FROM research_findings_genetic_modification_food_allergies WHERE publication_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY publication_date ASC;
SELECT researcher_name, COUNT(*) AS total_findings FROM research_findings_genetic_modification_food_allergies GROUP BY researcher_name HAVING total_findings > 3 ORDER BY total_findings DESC;
SELECT * FROM ResearchFindings;
SELECT research_title, modification_type FROM ResearchFindings WHERE allergy_type = 'Peanut';
SELECT research_id, findings FROM ResearchFindings WHERE research_id = 3;
SELECT researcher_name, department FROM Researchers WHERE department = 'Biology';
SELECT * FROM Researchers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM Researchers WHERE department = 'Biology' ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, department FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_id > 5;
SELECT researcher_name, department, email FROM Researchers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM ResearchFindings WHERE research_id < 100 AND modification_type = 'Experimental';
SELECT research_title, allergy_type FROM ResearchFindings WHERE research_title LIKE '%Cancer%' ORDER BY research_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM research_findings;
SELECT research_title, findings FROM research_findings;
SELECT research_date, research_title FROM research_findings ORDER BY research_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM food_allergies WHERE allergy_severity = 'Severe';
SELECT allergy_name, allergy_triggers FROM food_allergies WHERE allergy_severity = 'Mild';
SELECT * FROM research_findings;
SELECT research_title, research_date FROM research_findings ORDER BY research_date DESC;
SELECT findings FROM research_findings WHERE research_title LIKE '%study%';
SELECT * FROM food_allergies WHERE allergy_severity='severe' ORDER BY id;
SELECT allergy_name, allergy_triggers FROM food_allergies WHERE allergy_triggers IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM research_studies;
SELECT study_name, publication_date FROM research_studies WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT researcher_name, study_name, publication_date FROM research_studies ORDER BY publication_date DESC;

SELECT r.result_id, r.result_description, s.study_name, m.modification_name, a.allergy_name FROM research_results r INNER JOIN research_studies s ON r.study_id = s.study_id INNER JOIN genetic_modifications m ON r.modification_id = m.modification_id INNER JOIN food_allergies a ON r.allergy_id = a.allergy_id;
SELECT * FROM genetic_modifications WHERE modification_name LIKE 'RNA%';
SELECT * FROM research_studies WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT study_name, researcher_name FROM research_studies WHERE study_id = 3;
SELECT study_name, COUNT(*) AS number_of_results FROM research_studies JOIN research_results ON research_studies.study_id = research_results.study_id GROUP BY study_name;

SELECT research_studies.study_name, genetic_modifications.modification_name, food_allergies.allergy_name FROM research_studies JOIN research_results ON research_studies.study_id = research_results.study_id JOIN genetic_modifications ON research_results.modification_id = genetic_modifications.modification_id JOIN food_allergies ON research_results.allergy_id = food_allergies.allergy_id;
SELECT * FROM research_results WHERE result_description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM research_studies;
SELECT study_title, researcher_name FROM research_studies WHERE research_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT study_id, study_title, research_date FROM research_studies ORDER BY research_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM food_allergies WHERE allergy_type = 'Peanut';
SELECT author_name, study_title, result_description FROM research_authors JOIN research_results ON research_authors.study_id = research_results.study_id;
SELECT * FROM research_studies;
SELECT study_title, research_date FROM research_studies WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT r.study_id, rs.study_title, ra.author_name FROM research_results r JOIN research_studies rs ON r.study_id = rs.study_id JOIN research_authors ra ON rs.study_id = ra.study_id;
SELECT DISTINCT rs.study_title, fa.allergen_name FROM research_studies rs JOIN food_allergies fa ON rs.study_id = fa.allergy_id;

SELECT rs.study_id, rr.result_description, gm.modification_type FROM research_results rr JOIN research_studies rs ON rr.study_id = rs.study_id JOIN genetic_modification gm ON rr.modification_id = gm.modification_id WHERE rr.result_date > '2022-01-01';
